alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 11:27AM EDT until May 09 at 11:25AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saint Marys River near Decatur. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Agricultural flooding occurs along the river in northern...central and eastern Adams County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM EDT Sunday was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 8.8 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
